text: Ñɨn anɨb ak, Klays binɨb ne Judiya plopens, Galili plopens, Samaliya plopens pelpel apnan gɨpal okok, kɨli mɨdtep gɨlak. God Kawnan ak kɨlop kod mɨdaknɨŋ, God takaw ma kelɨgɨl, dɨtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨgun agɨl agɨlak. Anɨgɨl gos sek mɨdɨl kɨles gɨl jak tep gɨl mɨdɨl, binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl Jisas nop dɨlak.
